pages.title: Gravitational Anchor
pages.text: Overview $(br2)Applies extra gravity, linear/rotational damping to physics structures.

Main Panel $(br)$(li)Air Resist: Air resistance coefficient (positive values).$(li)Extra G: Additional gravity (set to -10 to cancel gravity).$(li)Rot Damp: Rotational damping (keep â‰¤0.1).$(li)Resist At Pos: Apply forces at anchor's center instead of structure's COM.
Warnings $(br)$(li)Avoid negative resistance (causes runaway acceleration).$(li)Rotational damping's effect point is irrelevant for torque.
